For First Time in 20 Years, Purdue Won't Have Election Day Polling Place on Campus  —  Purdue University in Indiana will not have an Election Day polling place this year.  The Tippecanoe County Election Board decided not to hold one, even though the campus has had one during the last four presidential elections.

Nevada politician guilty of using $70,000 meant for statue of slain officer for personal costs  —  A Nevada Republican politician who ran unsuccessfully two years ago for state treasurer was found guilty Thursday of using funds raised for a statue honoring a slain police officer for personal costs, including plastic surgery.
